column4: can someone help me fix my x server ? i run ubuntu 8.10 on thinkpad t61 with NVIDIA quadro NVS 140m, and I am planning on using the restricted nvidia driver 177.80 that comes with ubuntu. my problem is that when i start up x server by startx, i think something else is being loaded with the xorg.conf file that overwrites my x server settings
i disabled it by removing the gdm
you should start x with /etc/init.d/gdm start generally
apt-get install ubuntu-desktop or apt-get install gdm (prob)
